gamenya rekomended banget coi, saya sampai terkaget kaget.
jogo foda desde a época da lan house kk

Best multiplayer fps ever. Games may come and go but CS 1.6 stands tall, always.

What makes it so good though? Is it the graphics? Is it the game-play? Or is it something else? Well, the graphics are pretty simple, so is the game-play but what makes it stand out perhaps is the in-game physics and the skill cap.

It's a game which takes a while to master and no matter how much good you become, there's always someone who can teach you a new trick. Also, it's both skill and strategy so even if you aren't the best shooter, with a proper team and enough tactics, you can gain victory against someone better.

This game has given me infinite memories and still is creating newer ones. I really owe a lot to this game. Life is 1 but CS is 1.6.. forever :)

A timeless classic when i went back to play this shit again i felt the nostalgia once again , hitting me up like a train i love this game too much im never going to forget the old times and im going to make some new memories while im at it
vo compra la wea nomas es god
It's Counter-Strike, one of the most legendary shooters of all time. Of course it's good.
The guns sounds better than csgo

Честно говоря, CS 1.6 затянула меня меньше, чем CSS. Но это не значит, что она мне не понравилась. 

В 1.6 присутствует особая, неповторимая атмосфера. По сравнению с CS:GO здесь довольно дружелюбное комьюнити. Конечно, порой на серверах и бывают разборки, но крайне редко. 

Физика стрельбы - понятие относительное. Лично мне, человеку, который проиграл в сурс третью часть своей недолгой жизни, сложно было первое время стрелять с обычных пушек, будь то калаш или м-ка. 

В общем, если вам захочется поностальгировать, покупайте! 

10 метров разброса из 10.
EL MEJOR JUEGO DE LA HISTORIA

This game has absolutely ruined my life. I had a career, prospects, a beautiful wife and the dream home. Now I mainly partake in methamphetamines whilst drinking Monster Energy drinks and reloading de_dustworld for the 27th time that day. My keyboard is encrusted with doritos crumbs and dried semen. I am a broken man.
当然，我以前的童年是罪恶都市，可当我玩了，才知道，我这37块花得值！！！！
El mejor fps de la historia sin dudas!
